solution_line_template: There are a total of {total_spaces} spaces - {section1_spaces} spaces = <<{total_spaces}-{section1_spaces}={remaining_spaces}>>{remaining_spaces} spaces in both sections 2 and 3.
The number of spaces in section 2 is {section3_spaces} + {section2_more_than_3} = <<{section3_spaces}+{section2_more_than_3}={section2_spaces}>>{section2_spaces}.
